answers.answer: well my first one I didn't fast either.but I tested high. so I had to test again 2 hours later. the only thing I think imma do this time around is ptobably eat little as possible and drink that nasty cola and hopefully it'll come out good. good luck to you.

Thank you so much cause the first i tested mines was high n they didnt let me test again doing a two hr they had me start medicine right away n i think im going to do tha same thing but i dont wanna do that because its going to be low n i might actually have it but im thinking if they would of did a two after it came back high than it would of been a little lower im confused! !!
@ashleyfife did ur two hr come back low
I was also wondering since i ate before i teatd tha first tha nxt time i have to test n i fast will it really make a difference
no my two hour came out right where it needed to be. I hope they let you test again if it's high.I'm not sure if fasting makes a difference or not really. when is your test?
Well i really dont think they will let me i have a while before my test im only nine weeks but i was just concerned cause i had it before

I've had it with 2 out of 4 pregnancies. I've never had to be fastening for a one hr test, just let my Dr know what I had before the test. If you have to do a three hr they don't want you eating for 10 hrs:o. The three hr is a nightmare but its worth knowing just how bad or good your sugar levels are.
well you'll have to keep us updated for sure! I think you'll do fine.

question: I had gestational diabetes with my first child what r tha chances ill have it again? N also when i got checked for it wit my first i didnt fast n i ate mcdonalds that morning before i did the glucose test is that y it was pretty high??? I really dont want to go through this again n i dont believe i really had it everyone i asked said that they had to fast but for some reason the doctor told me it doesnt matter?? Any advice please help me???
title: gestational diabetes
